model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactRelationAut.raw_sql:
WITH base AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        AuthorityPolicy_TenantId Tenant_Id
        , coalesce(apol.AuthorityPolicy_Id, 0) AS AuthorityPolicy_Id
        , coalesce(a.Authority_Id, 0) AS Authority_Id
        , coalesce(cs.Controlset_Id, 0) AS Controlset_Id
        , (CASE
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NOT NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Authority with Control Set'
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NOT NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NULL THEN 'Authority with no Control Set'
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Control Set with no Authority'
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NULL THEN 'AuthorityPolicy without Authority, Control Set'
            END) +
        CASE
            WHEN apol.AuthorityPolicy_Id IS NULL THEN ' and Unlinked' ELSE ''
        END AuthorityToControlSet_Label
        , (CASE
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NOT NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Control Set with Authority'
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NOT NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NULL THEN 'Authority with no Control Set'
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Control Set with no Authority'
            WHEN
                a.Authority_Id IS NULL AND cs.Controlset_Id IS NULL THEN 'AuthorityPolicy without Authority, Control Set'
            END) +
        CASE
            WHEN apol.AuthorityPolicy_Id IS NULL THEN ' and Unlinked' ELSE ''
        END ControlSetToAuthority_Label
    FROM {{ ref("vwAuthority") }} a
    LEFT JOIN {{ ref("vwAuthorityPolicy") }} apol
        ON a.Authority_Id = apol.AuthorityPolicy_AuthorityId
    RIGHT JOIN {{ ref("vwControlset") }} cs
        ON apol.AuthorityPolicy_PolicyId = cs.Controlset_Id
)

SELECT *
FROM base
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactRelationAut.name: FactRelationAuthorityToControlSet

model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactRelationPro.raw_sql:
WITH base AS (
    SELECT
        pc.ProvisionControl_TenantId Tenant_Id
        , Coalesce(pc.ProvisionControl_Id, 0) AS ProvisionControl_Id
        , Coalesce(aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id, 0) AS AuthorityProvision_Id
        , Coalesce(c.Controls_Id, 0) AS Controls_Id
        , CASE
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NOT NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Provision with Controls'
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NOT NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NULL THEN 'Provision with no Controls'
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Control with no Provisions'
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NULL THEN 'ProvisionControl with no Provisions or Controls'
        END +
        CASE
            WHEN pc.ProvisionControl_Id IS NULL THEN ' and Unlinked' ELSE ''
        END ProvisionToControl_Label
        , CASE
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NOT NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Control with Provision'
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NOT NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NULL THEN 'Provision with no Controls'
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NOT NULL THEN 'Control with no Provisions'
            WHEN
                aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id IS NULL AND c.Controls_Id IS NULL THEN 'ProvisionControl with no Provisions or Controls'
        END +
        CASE
            WHEN pc.ProvisionControl_Id IS NULL THEN ' and Unlinked' ELSE ''
        END ControlToProvision_Label
    FROM {{ ref("vwAuthorityProvision") }} aprov
    LEFT JOIN {{ ref("vwProvisionControl") }} pc -- all provisions
        ON
            aprov.AuthorityProvision_Id = pc.ProvisionControl_AuthorityReferenceId
    RIGHT JOIN {{ ref("vwControls") }} c -- all controls
        ON pc.ProvisionControl_ControlsId = c.Controls_Id
)

SELECT *
FROM base
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactRelationPro.name: FactRelationProvisionToControl

model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactResponsibil.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view') }}

{# 
	Fact of Responsibilities taken from DimResponsibility
    Grain - one row per responsibility per owner per assigned user
 #}

with grain as (

select 
{# Dimensions #}

	-- hierarchy 
		r.Responsibility_TenantId,
	r.DimResponsibilityId Responsibility_Id,

    roa.ResponsibilityOwner_Id Responsibility_OwnerId,

    roa.ResponsibilityAssignee_Id Responsibility_AssigneeId,

    rc.ResponsibilityControl_ControlId Responsibility_ControlId,

{# Fact row #}

    -- hash key
    HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', 
	          {{ id_char("'r#'","r.DimResponsibilityId") }} +
			  {{ id_char("'_ro#'","roa.ResponsibilityOwner_Id") }} +
			  {{ id_char("'_ra#'","roa.ResponsibilityAssignee_Id") }} +
			  {{ id_char("'_c#'","rc.ResponsibilityControl_ControlId") }}
			) as FactResponsibilityId,		  

	-- durable key
   	r.Responsibility_RootId,
	r.Responsibility_Version,
	-- created from template responsbility ID
	r.Responsibility_TemplateResponsibilityId,
	-- Created from responsibility ID
	r.Responsibility_ParentResponsibilityId,
	-- attributes
	r.Responsibility_Title,
	r.Responsibility_Description,
	r.Responsibility_DueDate,
	r.Responsibility_Time,
	r.Responsibility_Status,
	r.Responsibility_StatusCode,
	r.Responsibility_PublishedDate,
	r.Responsibility_Period,
	r.Responsibility_PeriodicResponsibilityId,
	r.Responsibility_PeriodStartDate,
	r.Responsibility_Order,
	r.Responsibility_ActionStatus,
	r.Responsibility_ActionStatusCode,
	-- metrics
	r.Responsibility_ActionStatus Responsibility_IsCompleted, 
	r.Responsibility_IsCurrent,
	r.Responsibility_IsEditing,
	r.Responsibility_IsPublished,
	cast(r.Responsibility_IsDeprecated as int) Responsibility_IsDeprecated,	
	r.Responsibility_IsTemplate,
	r.Responsibility_IsRoot,
	r.Responsibility_HasPeriod,
	r.Responsibility_HasControl,
	r.Responsibility_HasAssignedTask,
	r.Responsibility_HasOwner,
	r.Responsibility_HasAssignee
from {{ ref("DimResponsibility") }} r
left join {{ ref("StgResponsibilityOwnerAssignee") }} roa
  on r.DimResponsibilityId = roa.Responsibility_Id
left join {{ref("vwResponsibilityControl")}} rc
  on r.DimResponsibilityId = rc.ResponsibilityControl_ResponsibilityId 
)

{# 
    Grain key = FactResponsibilityId + DimResponsibilityOwner+DimResponsibilityAssignee
 #}
SELECT
	-- Primary key
	{{ dim_fkey("Responsibility_TenantId","TenantId") }}, -- DimTenant
	{# Fact Row  #}
	-- Primary Key
	FactResponsibilityId,

	-- durable key for Responsibility
   	Responsibility_RootId,
	Responsibility_Version,
	-- created from Responsibility template id
	Responsibility_TemplateResponsibilityId,
	-- created from Responsibility Id
	Responsibility_ParentResponsibilityId,
	-- attributes
	Responsibility_Title,
	Responsibility_Description,
	Responsibility_DueDate,
	Responsibility_Time,
	Responsibility_Status,
	Responsibility_StatusCode,
	Responsibility_PublishedDate,
	Responsibility_Period,
	Responsibility_PeriodicResponsibilityId,
	Responsibility_PeriodStartDate,
	Responsibility_Order,
	Responsibility_ActionStatus,
	Responsibility_ActionStatusCode,
	-- metrics
	Responsibility_IsCompleted, 
	Responsibility_IsCurrent,
	Responsibility_IsEditing,
	Responsibility_IsPublished,
	Responsibility_IsDeprecated,
	Responsibility_IsTemplate,
	Responsibility_IsRoot,
	Responsibility_HasPeriod,
	Responsibility_HasControl,
	Responsibility_HasAssignedTask,
	Responsibility_HasOwner,
	Responsibility_HasAssignee,
	-- Dimensions
	-- dim_fkey(<fact dim key>, <rename to dim<name>>)
    {{ dim_fkey("Responsibility_OwnerId","ResponsibilityOwnerId") }}, -- DimResponsibilityOwner
	{{ dim_fkey("Responsibility_AssigneeId","ResponsibilityAssigneeId") }}, -- DimResponsibilityAssignee
	{{ dim_fkey("Responsibility_ControlId","ControlsetId") }} -- DimControlset
FROM
	grain
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactResponsibil.name: FactResponsibility

model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactResponsibil.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view') }}

{# 

    Grain - one row per responsibility task per owner per assigned user per copntrol

 #}

with grain as (

select 
{# Dimensions #}

	-- hierarchy 
		ResponsibilityTask_TenantId, -- 
		ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityId, -- 
	ResponsibilityTask_Id, 

    roa.ResponsibilityOwner_Id ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityOwnerId,

    roa.ResponsibilityAssignee_Id ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityAssigneeId,

    rc.ResponsibilityControl_ControlId ResponsibilityTask_ControlId,

{# Fact row #}
    -- hash key
    HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', 
	          {{ id_char("'rt#'","ResponsibilityTask_Id") }} +
			  {{ id_char("'_ro#'","roa.ResponsibilityOwner_Id") }} +
			  {{ id_char("'_ra#'","roa.ResponsibilityAssignee_Id") }} +
			  {{ id_char("'_c#'","rc.ResponsibilityControl_ControlId") }}
			) as FactResponsibilityTaskId,		  

	ResponsibilityTask_Response,
	ResponsibilityTask_UserId,
	ResponsibilityTask_Status,
	ResponsibilityTask_StatusCode,
	ResponsibilityTask_StartDate,
	ResponsibilityTask_CompletionDate,
	ResponsibilityTask_DueDate,
	cast(ResponsibilityTask_Status as int) ResponsibilityTask_IsCompleted,
	1 - cast(ResponsibilityTask_Status as int) ResponsibilityTask_IsNew,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsCompletedOnTime,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsCompletedLate,
	cast(ResponsibilityTask_IsDeprecated as int) ResponsibilityTask_IsDeprecated
from {{ ref("vwResponsibilityTask(deprecated)") }} rt
left join {{ ref("StgResponsibilityOwnerAssignee") }} roa
  on rt.ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityId = roa.Responsibility_Id
left join {{ref("vwResponsibilityControl")}} rc
  on rt.ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityId = rc.ResponsibilityControl_ResponsibilityId 
)

select 
{# Dimensions with FK to capture 0 on NULL keys #}

	{{ dim_fkey("ResponsibilityTask_TenantId","TenantId") }}, 
	{{ dim_fkey("ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityId","ResponsibilityId") }},
	{{ dim_fkey("ResponsibilityTask_Id","ResponsibilityTaskId") }}, 
    {{ dim_fkey("ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityOwnerId","ResponsibilityOwnerId") }},
    {{ dim_fkey("ResponsibilityTask_ResponsibilityAssigneeId","ResponsibilityAssigneeId") }},
    {{ dim_fkey("ResponsibilityTask_ControlId","ControlSetId") }},

{# Fact row #}
	FactResponsibilityTaskId,
	ResponsibilityTask_Response,
	ResponsibilityTask_UserId,
	ResponsibilityTask_Status,
	ResponsibilityTask_StatusCode,
	ResponsibilityTask_StartDate,
	ResponsibilityTask_CompletionDate,
	ResponsibilityTask_DueDate,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsCompleted,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsNew,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsCompletedOnTime,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsCompletedLate,
	ResponsibilityTask_IsDeprecated
from grain rt
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactResponsibil.name: FactResponsibilityTask

model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactRisk.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view') }}

-- One row per version of Risk

with grain as (
	SELECT
	f.Risk_TenantId,
	f.Risk_AbstractRiskId,
	f.Risk_RiskReviewId,
	f.Risk_RiskCategoryId,
	f.Risk_IdentifiedBy,
	f.Risk_Id,

	f.Risk_Name,
	f.Risk_Description,
	f.Risk_Status,
	f.Risk_StatusCode,
	COALESCE(f.Risk_ParentRiskId,0) Risk_ParentRiskId,
	COALESCE(f.Risk_RootRiskId,f.Risk_Id) Risk_RootRiskId,
	f.Risk_Version,
	f.Risk_IsCurrent,
	f.Risk_PublishedDate,
	f.Risk_PublishedById,
	f.Risk_IdRef,
	f.Risk_FavouriteRiskAssessmentId,
	f.Risk_CommonCause,
	f.Risk_LikelyImpact
	FROM {{ ref('vwRisk') }} f
)

SELECT
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_TenantId","TenantId") }}, -- DimTenant
	-- Risk 
	grain.Risk_Id FactRiskId,
	-- Historicaal fields
	grain.Risk_RootRiskId FactRiskDurableId,
	grain.Risk_Version,
	grain.Risk_ParentRiskId,
	Risk_PublishedDate,
	Risk_PublishedById,
	Risk_IsCurrent,
	grain.Risk_IdRef,
	grain.Risk_Name,
	grain.Risk_Description,
	grain.Risk_Status,
	grain.Risk_StatusCode,
	grain.Risk_CommonCause, 
	grain.Risk_LikelyImpact,	
	-- Dimensions
	-- dim_fkey(<fact dim key>, <rename to dim<name>>)
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_Id","RiskUserListId") }}, -- DimRiskUserList
    {{ dim_fkey("Risk_Id","RiskAttributeListId") }}, -- DimRiskAttributeList
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_AbstractRiskId","AbstractRiskId") }}, -- DimAbstractRisk
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_RiskReviewId","RiskReviewId") }}, -- DimRiskReview
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_RiskCategoryId","RiskCategoryId") }}, -- DimRiskCategory
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_IdentifiedBy","IdentifiedById") }}, -- DimIdentifiedBy
	{{ dim_fkey("Risk_FavouriteRiskAssessmentId","FavouriteRiskAssessmentId") }} -- DimFavouriteRiskAssessment
FROM
	grain
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.FactRisk.name: FactRisk

model.sixclicks_dev_orig.StgResponsibili.raw_sql:
{{ config(materialized='view') }}

select 
r.Responsibility_Id,
ro.ResponsibilityOwner_Id,
case when ro.ResponsibilityOwner_UserId is null then 'Owner Organisation' else 'Owner User' end Responsibility_OwnerType,
coalesce(ro.ResponsibilityOwner_UserId,ro.ResponsibilityOwner_OrganizationUnitId) Responsibility_OwnerId,
ra.ResponsibilityAssignee_Id,
case when ra.ResponsibilityAssignee_UserId is null then 'Assignee Organisation' else 'Assignee User' end Responsibility_AssigneeType,
coalesce(ra.ResponsibilityAssignee_UserId,ra.ResponsibilityAssignee_OrganizationUnitId) Responsibility_AssigneeId 
from {{ ref("vwResponsibility") }} r
left join {{ ref("vwResponsibilityOwner") }} ro
    on ro.ResponsibilityOwner_ResponsibilityId = r.Responsibility_Id 
left join {{ ref("vwResponsibilityAssignee") }} ra
    on ra.ResponsibilityAssignee_ResponsibilityId = r.Responsibility_Id
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.StgResponsibili.name: StgResponsibilityOwnerAssignee

model.sixclicks_dev_orig.Test_FactRisk.raw_sql:
-- dimensions:
--  zero key
--  filtered on not deleted

with fact as (
select 
-- tenant
f.DimTenantId,
-- fact keys and scd
f.FactRiskDurableId, 
f.FactRiskId,
f.Risk_Version,
f.Risk_IsCurrent,
-- Dimension keys
f.DimRiskUserListId,
f.DimRiskAttributeListId,
f.DimAbstractRiskId,
f.DimRiskReviewId,
f.DimRiskCategoryId,
f.DimIdentifiedById,
f.DimFavouriteRiskAssessmentId, 
-- fact attributes and measures
f.Risk_IdRef,
f.Risk_Name,
f.Risk_Description,
f.Risk_Status, 
f.Risk_StatusCode,
f.Risk_CommonCause,
f.Risk_LikelyImpact,
f.Risk_PublishedDate,
f.Risk_PublishedById,
dib.DimIdentifiedById dib,
dral.DimRiskAttributeListId dral,
drc.DimRiskCategoryId drc,
drr.DimRiskReviewId drr,
drul.DimRiskUserListId drul,
dt.DimTenantId dt,
dar.AbstractRisk_Id dar
from {{ ref("FactRisk") }} f
left join {{ ref("DimIdentifiedBy") }} dib 
  on f.DimIdentifiedById = dib.DimIdentifiedById
left join {{ ref("DimRiskAttributeList") }} dral 
  on f.DimRiskAttributeListId = dral.DimRiskAttributeListId 
left join {{ ref("DimRiskCategory") }} drc 
  on f.DimRiskCategoryId = drc.DimRiskCategoryId 
left join {{ ref("DimRiskReview") }} drr 
  on f.DimRiskReviewId = drr.DimRiskReviewId 
left join {{ ref("DimRiskUserList") }} drul 
  on f.DimRiskUserListId = drul.DimRiskUserListId 
left join {{ ref("DimTenant") }} dt 
  on f.DimTenantId = dt.DimTenantId
left join {{ ref("DimAbstractRisk") }} dar 
  on f.DimAbstractRiskId = dar.AbstractRisk_Id
)

select 
'DimIdentifiedBy' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimIdentifiedById) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimIdentifiedById is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimIdentifiedById = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimIdentifiedById = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f

union all

select 
'DimRiskAttributeList' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimRiskAttributeListId) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimRiskAttributeListId is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimRiskAttributeListId = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimRiskAttributeListId = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f

union all

select 
'DimRiskCategory' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimRiskCategoryId) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimRiskCategoryId is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimRiskCategoryId = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimRiskCategoryId = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f

union all

select 
'DimRiskReview' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimRiskReviewId) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimRiskReviewId is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimRiskReviewId = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimRiskReviewId = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f

union all

select 
'DimRiskUserList' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimRiskUserListId) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimRiskUserListId is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimRiskUserListId = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimRiskUserListId = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f

union all

select 
'DimTenant' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimTenantId) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimTenantId is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimTenantId = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimTenantId = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f

union all

select 
'DimAbstractRisk' dim,
count(*) all_count,
count(distinct f.FactRiskId) fact_count,
count(distinct f.DimAbstractRiskId) key_count, 
sum(case when f.DimAbstractRiskId is null then 1 else 0 end) key_null,
sum(case when f.DimAbstractRiskId = 0 then 1 else 0 end) key_zero,
sum(case when f.DimAbstractRiskId = -1 then 1 else 0 end) key_deleted
from fact f
model.sixclicks_dev_orig.Test_FactRisk.name: Test_FactRisk

analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.Test_IssuesA.raw_sql:
select *
from (
	
	select 'Issues' TableName,count(*) row_count
	from Issues
	
	union all 
	
	select 'Issues not deleted',count(*)
	from Issues
	where Issues.IsDeleted = 0
	
	union all
	
	select 'vwIssues',count(*)
	from test_dbt_cicd.vwIssues vi 
	
	union all
	
	select 'vwIssuesAttributeList',count(*)
	from test_dbt_cicd.vwIssuesAttributeList vial  
	
) as T
where row_count <> (select count(*) from dbo.Issues)

analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_1.raw_sql:
SELECT TOP(2) [p].[Id],
    [p].[ACROSSDomain],
    [p].[ArchivedDate],
    [p].[AssessmentVersion],
    [p].[AuthorityId],
    [p].[BulkSendAssessmentLogId],
    [p].[ClosedDate],
    [p].[ClosedReason],
    [p].[ConfirmationCode],
    [p].[CreatedFromAssessmentId],
    [p].[CreatedFromTemplateId],
    [p].[CreationTime],
    [p].[CreatorUserId],
    [p].[DeleterUserId],
    [p].[DeletionTime],
    [p].[Description],
    [p].[DueDate],
    [p].[EndPage],
    [p].[EngagementId], 
    [p].[HasPeriod],
    [p].[ImageUrl], [p].[Introduction], [p].[IsArchived], [p].[IsArchivedForVendor], [p].[IsDeleted], [p].[IsDeprecatedAssessmentVersion], [p].[IsTemplate], [p].[LastModificationTime], [p].[LastModifierUserId], [p].[Name], [p].[Objective], [p].[ParentAssessmentId], [p].[ParentMarketplaceTemplateId], [p].[ParentTemplateId], [p].[Period], [p].[PeriodStartDate], [p].[PeriodicAssessmentId], [p].[PolicyId], [p].[PublishedById],
    [p].[PublishedDate],
    [p].[QuestionType], [p].[ReAssessmentParentId], [p].[ReAssessmentRootId], [p].[ReAssessmentVersion], [p].[ResponseCompletedDate], [p].[ResponseStartedDate], [p].[ReviewedDate], [p].[RootAssessmentId], [p].[RootTemplateId],
    [p].[RoundResultToNearest],
    [p].[Status],
    [p].[Tags],
    [p].[TemplateType],
    [p].[TemplateVersion],
    [p].[TenantId],
    [p].[TenantVendorId],
    [p].[TypeId],
    [p].[WithinDomain],
    [p].[WorkFlowId]
FROM [Assessment] AS [p]
WHERE (((([p].[IsDeleted] = 0) OR ([p].[IsDeleted] <> @__ef_filter__IsSoftDeleteFilterEnabled_0)) AND (([p].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_1) OR (CASE
    WHEN [p].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_1
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END = @__ef_filter__IsMayHaveTenantFilterEnabled_2))) AND ([p].[WorkFlowId] = 1)) AND ([p].[Id] = @__input_AssessmentId_0)
ORDER BY [p].[Id]
analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_1.name: sqlraw_1

analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_10.raw_sql:
SELECT
    [adpi].[Id],
    [adpi].[AssessmentDomainProvisionId],
    [adpi].[AssessmentId],
    [adpi].[AssessmentResponseId],
    [adpi].[CreationTime],
    [adpi].[CreatorUserId],
    [adpi].[DeleterUserId],
    [adpi].[DeletionTime],
    [adpi].[IsDeleted],
    [adpi].[IssueId],
    [adpi].[LastModificationTime],
    [adpi].[LastModifierUserId],
    [adpi].[TenantId],
    [t].[Id],
    [t].[CreationTime],
    [t].[CreatorUserId],
    [t].[DeleterUserId],
    [t].[DeletionTime],
    [t].[Description],
    [t].[DueDate],
    [t].[IdRef],
    [t].[IsArchived],
    [t].[IsDeleted],
    [t].[LastModificationTime],
    [t].[LastModifierUserId],
    [t].[Name],
    [t].[ParentIssueId],
    [t].[Priority],
    [t].[PublishedById],
    [t].[RecordedDate],
    [t].[ReportedBy],
    [t].[ResolvedDate],
    [t].[RootIssueId],
    [t].[Stage],
    [t].[Status],
    [t].[TenantId],
    [t].[Version]
FROM [AssessmentDomainProvisionIssue] AS [adpi]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT [i].[Id], [i].[CreationTime], [i].[CreatorUserId], [i].[DeleterUserId], [i].[DeletionTime], [i].[Description], [i].[DueDate], [i].[IdRef], [i].[IsArchived], [i].[IsDeleted], [i].[LastModificationTime], [i].[LastModifierUserId], [i].[Name], [i].[ParentIssueId], [i].[Priority], [i].[PublishedById], [i].[RecordedDate], [i].[ReportedBy], [i].[ResolvedDate], [i].[RootIssueId], [i].[Stage], [i].[Status], [i].[TenantId], [i].[Version]
    FROM [Issues] AS [i]
    WHERE (([i].[IsDeleted] = 0) OR ([i].[IsDeleted] <> @__ef_filter__IsSoftDeleteFilterEnabled_3))
      AND (([i].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_4) OR
      (CASE
        WHEN CASE
            WHEN [i].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_4
            THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
        END = 1
        THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
    END = @__ef_filter__IsMustHaveTenantFilterEnabled_5))
) AS [t] ON [adpi].[IssueId] = [t].[Id]
WHERE 0 = 1
analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_10.name: sqlraw_10

analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_11.raw_sql:
SELECT [e].[Id]
FROM [AuthorityProvisionCustomField] AS [e]
WHERE (([e].[IsDeleted] = 0) OR ([e].[IsDeleted] <> @__ef_filter__IsSoftDeleteFilterEnabled_0))
  AND ([e].[AuthorityId] = @__authorityId_0)
ORDER BY [e].[Order]
analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_11.name: sqlraw_11

analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_2.raw_sql:
SELECT
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[Id],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[AssessmentId],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[CreationTime],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[CreatorUserId],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[CustomFieldId],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[DeleterUserId],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[DeletionTime],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[IsDeleted],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[LastModificationTime],
    [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[LastModifierUserId],
     [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[Order],
     [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[TenantId]
FROM [AssessmentCustomField] AS [p.AssessmentCustomFields]
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT TOP(1) [p0].[Id]
    FROM [Assessment] AS [p0]
    WHERE (((([p0].[IsDeleted] = 0) OR ([p0].[IsDeleted] <> @__ef_filter__IsSoftDeleteFilterEnabled_6)) AND (([p0].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_7) OR (CASE
        WHEN CASE
            WHEN [p0].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_7
            THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
        END = 1
        THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
    END = @__ef_filter__IsMayHaveTenantFilterEnabled_8))) AND ([p0].[WorkFlowId] = 1)) AND ([p0].[Id] = @__input_AssessmentId_0)
    ORDER BY [p0].[Id]
) AS [t] ON [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[AssessmentId] = [t].[Id]
WHERE (([p.AssessmentCustomFields].[IsDeleted] = 0) OR ([p.AssessmentCustomFields].[IsDeleted] <> @__ef_filter__IsSoftDeleteFilterEnabled_3)) AND (([p.AssessmentCustomFields].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_4) OR (CASE
    WHEN [p.AssessmentCustomFields].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_4
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END = @__ef_filter__IsMustHaveTenantFilterEnabled_5))
ORDER BY [t].[Id]
analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_2.name: sqlraw_2

analysis.sixclicks_dev_orig.sqlraw_3.raw_sql:
SELECT TOP(1)
    [a].[Id],
    [a].[AssessmentId],
    [a].[CreationTime],
    [a].[CreatorUserId],
    [a].[DeleterUserId],
    [a].[DeletionTime],
    [a].[ExternalSummary],
    [a].[InternalSummary],
    [a].[IsDeleted],
    [a].[LastModificationTime],
    [a].[LastModifierUserId],
    [a].[Name], [a].[Status], 
    [a].[SubmittedDate],
    [a].[TenantId],
    [a].[UserId],
    [a].[Version]
FROM [AssessmentResponse] AS [a]
WHERE ((([a].[IsDeleted] = 0) OR ([a].[IsDeleted] <> @__ef_filter__IsSoftDeleteFilterEnabled_0)) AND (([a].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_1) OR (CASE
    WHEN [a].[TenantId] = @__ef_filter__CurrentTenantId_1

macro.dbt_sqlserver.sqlserver__get_colum.name: sqlserver__get_columns_in_relation
macro.dbt_sqlserver.sqlserver__get_colum.macro_sql:
{% macro sqlserver__get_columns_in_relation(relation) -%}
  {% call statement('get_columns_in_relation', fetch_result=True) %}
      SELECT
          column_name,
          data_type,
          character_maximum_length,
          numeric_precision,
          numeric_scale
      FROM
          (select
              ordinal_position,
              column_name,
              data_type,
              character_maximum_length,
              numeric_precision,
              numeric_scale
          from [{{ relation.database }}].INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
          where table_name = '{{ relation.identifier }}'
            and table_schema = '{{ relation.schema }}'
          UNION ALL
          select
              ordinal_position,
              column_name collate database_default,
              data_type collate database_default,
              character_maximum_length,
              numeric_precision,
              numeric_scale
          from tempdb.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
          where table_name like '{{ relation.identifier }}%') cols
      order by ordinal_position


  {% endcall %}
  {% set table = load_result('get_columns_in_relation').table %}
  {{ return(sql_convert_columns_in_relation(table)) }}
{% endmacro %}

macro.dbt_sqlserver.sqlserver__make_temp.name: sqlserver__make_temp_relation

macro.dbt_sqlserver.sqlserver__get_catal.name: sqlserver__get_catalog
macro.dbt_sqlserver.sqlserver__get_catal.macro_sql:
{% macro sqlserver__get_catalog(information_schemas, schemas) -%}

  {%- call statement('catalog', fetch_result=True) -%}

    with tabs as (

		select
			TABLE_CATALOG as table_database,
			TABLE_SCHEMA as table_schema,
			TABLE_NAME as table_name,
			TABLE_TYPE as table_type,
			TABLE_SCHEMA as table_owner,
			null as table_comment
		from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES

    ),

    cols as (

        select
            table_catalog as table_database,
            table_schema,
            table_name,
            column_name,
            ordinal_position as column_index,
            data_type as column_type,
			null as column_comment
        from information_schema.columns

    )

    select
		tabs.table_database,
		tabs.table_schema,
		tabs.table_name,
		tabs.table_type,
		tabs.table_comment,
		tabs.table_owner,
		cols.column_name,
		cols.column_index,
		cols.column_type,
		cols.column_comment
    from tabs
    join cols on tabs.table_database = cols.table_database and tabs.table_schema = cols.table_schema and tabs.table_name = cols.table_name
    order by column_index

  {%- endcall -%}

  {{ return(load_result('catalog').table) }}

{%- endmacro %}

macro.dbt.snapshot_staging_table.name: snapshot_staging_table
macro.dbt.snapshot_staging_table.macro_sql:
{% macro snapshot_staging_table(strategy, source_sql, target_relation) -%}

    with snapshot_query as (

        {{ source_sql }}

    ),

    snapshotted_data as (

        select *,
            {{ strategy.unique_key }} as dbt_unique_key

        from {{ target_relation }}
        where dbt_valid_to is null

    ),

    insertions_source_data as (

        select
            *,
            {{ strategy.unique_key }} as dbt_unique_key,
            {{ strategy.updated_at }} as dbt_updated_at,
            {{ strategy.updated_at }} as dbt_valid_from,
            nullif({{ strategy.updated_at }}, {{ strategy.updated_at }}) as dbt_valid_to,
            {{ strategy.scd_id }} as dbt_scd_id

        from snapshot_query
    ),

    updates_source_data as (

        select
            *,
            {{ strategy.unique_key }} as dbt_unique_key,
            {{ strategy.updated_at }} as dbt_updated_at,
            {{ strategy.updated_at }} as dbt_valid_from,
            {{ strategy.updated_at }} as dbt_valid_to

        from snapshot_query
    ),

    {%- if strategy.invalidate_hard_deletes %}

    deletes_source_data as (

        select 
            *,
            {{ strategy.unique_key }} as dbt_unique_key
        from snapshot_query
    ),
    {% endif %}

    insertions as (

        select
            'insert' as dbt_change_type,
            source_data.*

        from insertions_source_data as source_data
        left outer join snapshotted_data on snapshotted_data.dbt_unique_key = source_data.dbt_unique_key
        where snapshotted_data.dbt_unique_key is null
           or (
                snapshotted_data.dbt_unique_key is not null
            and (
                {{ strategy.row_changed }}
            )
        )

    ),

    updates as (

        select
            'update' as dbt_change_type,
            source_data.*,
            snapshotted_data.dbt_scd_id

        from updates_source_data as source_data
        join snapshotted_data on snapshotted_data.dbt_unique_key = source_data.dbt_unique_key
        where (
            {{ strategy.row_changed }}
        )
    )

    {%- if strategy.invalidate_hard_deletes -%}
    ,

    deletes as (
    
        select
            'delete' as dbt_change_type,
            source_data.*,
            {{ snapshot_get_time() }} as dbt_valid_from,
            {{ snapshot_get_time() }} as dbt_updated_at,
            {{ snapshot_get_time() }} as dbt_valid_to,
            snapshotted_data.dbt_scd_id
    
        from snapshotted_data
        left join deletes_source_data as source_data on snapshotted_data.dbt_unique_key = source_data.dbt_unique_key
        where source_data.dbt_unique_key is null
    )
    {%- endif %}

    select * from insertions
    union all
    select * from updates
    {%- if strategy.invalidate_hard_deletes %}
    union all
    select * from deletes
    {%- endif %}

{%- endmacro %}

macro.dbt.default__snapshot_merge_sql.name: default__snapshot_merge_sql
macro.dbt.default__snapshot_merge_sql.macro_sql:
{% macro default__snapshot_merge_sql(target, source, insert_cols) -%}
    {%- set insert_cols_csv = insert_cols | join(', ') -%}

    merge into {{ target }} as DBT_INTERNAL_DEST
    using {{ source }} as DBT_INTERNAL_SOURCE
    on DBT_INTERNAL_SOURCE.dbt_scd_id = DBT_INTERNAL_DEST.dbt_scd_id

    when matched
     and DBT_INTERNAL_DEST.dbt_valid_to is null
     and DBT_INTERNAL_SOURCE.dbt_change_type in ('update', 'delete')
        then update
        set dbt_valid_to = DBT_INTERNAL_SOURCE.dbt_valid_to

    when not matched
     and DBT_INTERNAL_SOURCE.dbt_change_type = 'insert'
        then insert ({{ insert_cols_csv }})
        values ({{ insert_cols_csv }})
    ;
{% endmacro %}

dbt.__overview__.name: __overview__
dbt.__overview__.block_contents:
### Welcome!

Welcome to the auto-generated documentation for your dbt project!

### Navigation

You can use the `Project` and `Database` navigation tabs on the left side of the window to explore the models
in your project.

#### Project Tab
The `Project` tab mirrors the directory structure of your dbt project. In this tab, you can see all of the
models defined in your dbt project, as well as models imported from dbt packages.

#### Database Tab
The `Database` tab also exposes your models, but in a format that looks more like a database explorer. This view
shows relations (tables and views) grouped into database schemas. Note that ephemeral models are _not_ shown
in this interface, as they do not exist in the database.

### Graph Exploration
You can click the blue icon on the bottom-right corner of the page to view the lineage graph of your models.

On model pages, you'll see the immediate parents and children of the model you're exploring. By clicking the `Expand`
button at the top-right of this lineage pane, you'll be able to see all of the models that are used to build,
or are built from, the model you're exploring.

Once expanded, you'll be able to use the `--models` and `--exclude` model selection syntax to filter the
models in the graph. For more information on model selection, check out the [dbt docs](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/model-selection-syntax).

Note that you can also right-click on models to interactively filter and explore the graph.

---

### More information

- [What is dbt](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/overview)?
- Read the [dbt viewpoint](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/viewpoint)
- [Installation](https://docs.getdbt.com/docs/installation)
- Join the [chat](https://community.getdbt.com/) on Slack for live questions and support.
